attributes.action: Change the law regarding joint / co-signed loans if partners split up then the loan should be split as well
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My ex partner has decided to stop paying his half of a joint loan and I have been informed that there is nothing that can be done about this and I am now liable for the entire amount. After being told the law is unfair by the Citizens Advice Bureau and my bank, I think it is time for a change in the law / policies of money lending agencies. I propose that if a relationship breaks down then any outstanding joint debts should be automatically split so both parties have responsibility for paying and payment for the amount due doesn't just fall on one party.
